title: Understanding CAEP
text: The CAEP is an organization focused on improving the quality of education. Think about what their main goals might be.

hintAnswer: council for the accreditation of educator preparation
title: What does CAEP stand for?
text: CAEP stands for the Council for the Accreditation of Educator Preparation. This organization is dedicated to improving the quality and effectiveness of educators.
choices: council for the accreditation of educator preparation
standards which encompass a wide range of ethics, standards, and practices created to help guide those who have taken on the crucial role of educating students with disabilities
recommended practices designed to help improve the learning outcomes of young children who have or who are $$at-risk$$ for developmental delays or disabilities

hintAnswer: designed to improve the quality and effectiveness of not only new instructional practitioners, but also the $$evidence-based$$ used to assess those qualities in the classroom
title: What is the purpose of CAEP?
text: CAEP is designed to improve the quality and effectiveness of not only new instructional practitioners but also the evidence-based methods used to assess those qualities in the classroom.
choices: council for the accreditation of educator preparation,designed to improve the quality and effectiveness of not only new instructional practitioners, but also the $$evidence-based$$ used to assess those qualities in the classroom
standards which encompass a wide range of ethics, standards, and practices created to help guide those who have taken on the crucial role of educating students with disabilities
recommended practices designed to help improve the learning outcomes of young children who have or who are $$at-risk$$ for developmental delays or disabilities
